name: web-crypto-rsa-aes
author: Martin Hunt
description: fast rsa+aes using webcrypto with fallback to asmcrypto

scripts.build-fallback: [ ! -d lib ] && mkdir lib; [ ! -d asmcrypto ] && git clone https://github.com/vibornoff/asmcrypto.js asmcrypto; cd asmcrypto && npm install && grunt --with rng,sha1,utils,rsa-oaep-sha1-exports,aes-gcm,aes-cbc && mv asmcrypto.js ../lib
